title: Cross-city Carpool Information Extractor
original_prompt: Extract the following information from "{Carpool Information: Zhang San: Friday noon, Beijing Yizhuang to Tangshan, looking for passengers, 18332718888}": type (looking for passengers or looking for a car), departure location, destination, departure date, departure time, contact phone number, publisher, fare, and route, without outputting any other descriptions.
input1: {Carpool Information: Li Si: Saturday evening, Shanghai to Hangzhou, looking for a car, 13987654321}
input2: {Carpool Information: Wang Wu: Sunday morning, Guangzhou to Shenzhen, looking for passengers, 15876543210}
input1_ans:
type: looking for a car  
departure location: Shanghai  
destination: Hangzhou  
departure date: Saturday  
departure time: evening  
contact phone number: 13987654321  
publisher: Li Si  
fare: N/A  
route: N/A
input2_ans:
type: looking for passengers  
departure location: Guangzhou  
destination: Shenzhen  
departure date: Sunday  
departure time: morning  
contact phone number: 15876543210  
publisher: Wang Wu  
fare: N/A  
route: N/A
